snippet: Classic Shakespeare, Canadian acrobats and a GPS-led trek are among events planned for the 2014-15 season at the Skirball Center for the Performing Arts at New York University.
abstract: New York University's Skirball Center for the Performing Arts announces its 2014-15 season; partial list of productions, ranging from theater to music to circus shows, noted.
lead_paragraph: Classic Shakespeare, Canadian acrobats and a GPS-led trek are among events planned for the 2014-15 season at the Skirball Center for the Performing Arts at New York University.
